items.sentence: Tom had nothing to do with getting Mary fired.
Tom had some unfinished business to attend to.
Have you seen any other people on this island?
Tom has recently changed his telephone number.
Tom has something very important to tell Mary.
Tom noticed that Mary was sitting in his seat.
Tom offered to help Mary pay for a babysitter.
Tom often munches on snacks while watching TV.
Tom often plays tennis with Mary after school.
Tom often wears cowboy boots and a cowboy hat.
